siteMetadata.title: Maggie Appleton
siteMetadata.description: Maggie Appleton is an art director and anthropological designer. This is her digital garden for growing visual explanations about technology, culture, and programming

prevPage.excerpt: Illustration & art direction for Dave Ceddia's  Pure React  online course. Module Illustrations The course is split into 9 modules, each focusing on a specific skill set like  Modern JavaScript Essentials ,  API Requests,  and  Context forâ€¦
